title: আল জাজিরার ইনভেস্টিগেটিভ ইউনিট (আই-ইউনিট)-এর অনুসন্ধানে উঠে এসেছে বাংলাদেশের সাব...
description: আল জাজিরার ইনভেস্টিগেটিভ ইউনিট (আই-ইউনিট)-এর অনুসন্ধানে উঠে এসেছে বাংলাদেশের সাবেক প্রধানমন্ত্রী শেখ হাসিনা কর্তৃক, ২০২৪ এর রক্তাক্ত ছাত্র আন্দোলন দমনের লক্ষ্যে নির্দয় গোপন নির্দেশাবলির বিস্তারিত। #হাসিনা৩৬জুলাই

title: Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor (brother of the Charles III King of the United Kingdo...
description: Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor (brother of the Charles III King of the United Kingdom) has been arrested on suspicion of misconduct in public office, Thames Valley Police said. Police have been assessing allegations that Mountbatten-Windsor – formerly known as Prince Andrew – shared sensitive information with the billionaire child sex offender Jeffrey Epstein when he was a UK trade envoy. Reports The Guardian

title: -PRESS STATEMENT- February 19, 2026 Dhaka (Bangladesh): We, the Bangladeshi Jour...
description: -PRESS STATEMENT- February 19, 2026 Dhaka (Bangladesh): We, the Bangladeshi Journalists in International Media (BJIM), are deeply concerned by reports that Ekhon TV has issued show-cause notices to four senior journalists and barred them from entering the newsroom for seven days — including by circulating their photos to building security to block their access. The issue being cited is their activity on social media platforms. If accurate, this is a serious and disproportionate step that raises clear questions about due process, workplace rights, and editorial independence. A show cause letter, seen by BJIM, served to one of the four journalists mentions a Facebook post that reads “Delete post, otherwise TV and the journalists will be in trouble”, which apparently doesn’t point to anything that could be sensitive to any entity. BJIM is astounded by the extent of censorship imposed by Ekhon TV authorities on the freedom of expression of the journalists working in the outlet. Disciplinary matters must be handled through transparent, written policies and fair procedures — with clear grounds, the right to respond, and proportionate measures — not security-enforced exclusion that appears designed to intimidate. Ekhon TV’s owner and editors should immediately clarify the basis for this action, disclose the policy being invoked, and ensure that any process is conducted lawfully and fairly. The journalists’ access to the newsroom should be restored without delay. -End-

title: [Even as Indian conglomerate Adani Group faced allegations of market manipulatio...
description: [Even as Indian conglomerate Adani Group faced allegations of market manipulation in 2023, two men with ties to the Adani family — and director positions in associated firms — secretly invested billions in its listed companies.]
